Text: @azunal: don't know what your problem is, but it plays on all the media players you mentioned with the right codecs. maybe you're just preventing others not to d/l my uploads because you posted the same comment on most of my uploads. respect to all p2p groups & encoders!
U can try installing Combined Community Codec Pack. All my ups play perfectly in my vlc media player & wd tv live hub stand-alone hd media player.
don't delete, sayang! madali lang yang problema mo. mape-play mo rin yan! ano bang specs ng pc/laptop mo? OS?
i need to maintain a small file size, dolby audio & 720pixel width resolution which i cannot do in xvid codec. that's why i switch to x264.

good to hear that sir! nagtaka lang ako kung bakit di gumana sa vlc samantalang may sariling codecs din ang vlc media player kaya compatible halos lahat ng video format sa kanya. anyway, mabuti't ok na. enjoy!^^
warriorph..salamat sa mga sa upload mong tagalog..malaking bagay kagaya kong nandito sa saudi arabia..walang sinehan d2 eh ..
wala pong anuman! keep seeding lang po to keep the torrent alive.. thanks!
